markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Oil](/Traits.aspx?ID=121)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 634 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Oils are magical gels, ointments, pastes, or salves that are typically applied to an object and are used up in the process.
name: Oil
